title: Chartly Canonical Entity (v1)
description: A canonical Entity represents a durable object in the system (person, organization, asset, instrument, etc.). Entities are versioned by time (created_at/updated_at) and scoped by tenant.

type.description: Entity type discriminator (e.g., company, device, account).

attributes.description: Arbitrary entity attributes. Attribute keys/values are domain-specific.

created_at.description: RFC3339 timestamp when the entity was created.

updated_at.description: RFC3339 timestamp when the entity was last updated.
